title: Requests to a telephone operator
context: Ask an operator to connect your call or reverse the charges.

content.bestLine: Can you connect my call or reverse the charges?

neutral.text: I'd like to make a call
Can you help me with a call?
I need to make a call
I'd like to request a call
Can you assist me with a phone call?
I need assistance with a call

formal.text: I would appreciate a call connection
Can you facilitate a phone call for me?
I require assistance with a telephone call
Could you please connect my call?
I would like to request a call connection

patterns.template: I'd like to [options] the charges for this call

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hello, can you connect my call?

lines.speaker: Operator
lines.text: Yes, of course. Who would you like to call?

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Can you reverse the charges for this call?

lines.speaker: Operator
lines.text: I can assist you with that. Please hold for a moment.
